alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 2:58PM CST until March 06 at 6:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTRY MIX EXPECTED OVERNIGHT IN NORTH-CENTRAL WI... .A wintry mix is expected across north-central Wisconsin this evening into early Sunday morning ahead of and behind a surface low pressure system. The freezing rain will mainly occur along the Wisconsin and Upper Michigan border during the evening, and then become widespread across north-central Wisconsin with snow mixing in after midnight into early Sunday morning. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations between a light glaze and one quarter of an inch. * WHERE...Oneida, Vilas, Florence and Forest Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
